song.title: I will Worship
song.text:
Tag 1 I will worship, I will worship with all of my heart, with all of my heart. I will praise You, I will praise You with all my strength, all my strength.
Tag 2 I will seek You, I will seek You, All of my days, all of my days. I will follow, I will follow, All of Your ways, all Your ways.
Tag 3 I will give You all my worship, I will give You all my praise. You alone I long to worship, You alone are worthy of my praise.
Tag 4 I will bow down, I will bow down, Hail You as King, hail You as King. I will serve You, I will serve You, Give You everything, give You everything.
Tag 5 I will lift up, I will lift up, My eyes to Your throne, my eyes to Your throne. I will trust You, I will trust You, I will trust You alone, trust You alone.
Tag 6 I will give You all my worship I will give you all my praise You alone I long to worship You alone are worthy of my praise.

song.title: Only a God Like You - Praise Song
song.text:
Tag 1 For the praises of man, I will never, ever stand For the kingdoms of this world I'll never give my heart away or shout my praise!
Tag 2 My allegiance and devotion my heart's desire and all emotion go to serve the Man who died upon that tree
Tag 3 Only a God like You could be worthy of my praise and all my hope and faith To only a King of all kings do I bow my knee and sing give my everything
Tag 4 Only a God like You could be worthy of my praise and all my hope and faith; to only a King of all kings do I bow my knee and sing give my everything
Tag 5 To only my Maker, my Father my Savior, Redeemer, Restorer, Rebuilder, Rewarder; to only a God like You, do I give my praise!
Tag 6 For the praises of man, I will never, ever stand For the kingdoms of this world I'll never give my heart away or shout my praise!
Tag 7 My allegiance and devotion my heart's desire and all emotion go to serve the Man who died upon that tree
Tag 8 Only a God like You could be worthy of my praise and all my hope and faith; To only a King of all kings do I bow my knee and sing give my everything
Tag 9 To only my Maker, my Father my Savior, Redeemer, Restorer, Rebuilder, Rewarder; to only a God like You, do I give my praise!
Tag 10 Only a God like You, Only a God like You, Only a God like You! (Repeat)
Tag 11 To only my Maker, my Father my Savior, Redeemer, Restorer, Rebuilder, Rewarder; to only a God like You, do I give my praise!
Tag 12 Only a God like You, Only a God like You, Only a God like You! (Repeat)
Tag 13 To only my Maker, my Father my Savior, Redeemer, Restorer, Rebuilder, Rewarder; to only a God like You, do I give my praise!

song.title: How Great is Our God - Praise Song
song.text:
Tag 1 Splendor of the King, Clothed in Majesty, Let all the earth rejoice All the earth rejoice.
Tag 2 He wraps Himself in light, and darkness tries to hide And trembles at His voice, trembles at His voice.
Tag 3 How great is our God, sing with me How great is our God, all will see How great, how great is our God
Tag 4 Age to age He stands, and time is in His hands Beginning and the end, Beginning and the end
Tag 5 The Godhead, three in one: Father, Spirit, Son, The Lion and the Lamb, the Lion and the Lamb
Tag 6 How great is our God, sing with me How great is our God, all will see How great, how great is our God
Tag 7 Name above all names, Worthy of all praise, My heart will sing How great is our God.
Tag 8 How great is our God, sing with me How great is our God, all will see How great, how great is our God

song.title: Praise To The Lord The Almighty - # 256
song.text:
Praise to the Lord, The Almighty Hymn # 256
Verse 1 Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, The King of creation! O my soul, praise Him, For He is thy health and salvation! All ye who hear, Now to His temple draw near; Join me in glad adoration!
Verse 2 Praise to the Lord, Who o'er all things So wondrously reigneth, Shelters thee under His wings, Yes, so gently sustaineth! Hast Thou not seen How all thy longings have been Granted in what He ordaineth?
Verse 3 Praise to the Lord, Who doth prosper Thy work and defend thee; Surely His goodness and mercy Here daily attend thee. Ponder anew what the Almighty can do,
Verse 4 Praise to the Lord! O let all that is in me adore Him! All that hath life and breath, Come now with praises before Him. Let the amen sound from His people again: Gladly for aye we adore Him.

group.title: -- Announcments, Offering (Landry), Choir, Cong Prayer (Bruce D) --

textbox.text: Pleasant Hill Church

song.title: Day By Day - #334
song.text:
Day by Day Hymn # 234
Verse 1 Day by day and with each passing moment, Strength I find to meet my trials here; Trusting in my Father's wise bestowment, I've no cause for worry or for fear.
Verse 1 (2) He whose heart is kind beyond all measure, Give unto each day what He deems best; Lovingly, its part of pain and pleasure, Mingling toil with peace and rest.
Verse 2 Ev'ry day the Lord Himself is near me With a special mercy for each hour; All my cares He fain would bear and cheer me, He whose name is Counselor and Pow'r.
Verse 2 (2) The protection of His child and treasure, Is a charge that on Himself He laid; "As your days, your strength shall be in measure," This the pledge to me He made.
Verse 3 Help me then in ev'ry tribulation, So to trust Your promises, O Lord; That I lose not faith's sweet consolation, Offered me within Your holy Word.
Verse 3 (2) Help me, Lord, when toil and trouble meeting, E'er to take, as from a Father's hand, One by one, the days, the moments fleeting,

textbox.text:
Please Stand

as we read together

Ruth 4:1-22

Meanwhile Boaz went up to the town gate and sat there. When the kinsman-redeemer he had mentioned came along, Boaz said, "Come over here, my friend, and sit down." So he went over and sat down. Boaz took ten of the elders of the town and said, "Sit here,"
Leader:

and they did so. Then he said to the kinsman-redeemer, "Naomi, who has come back from Moab, is selling the piece of land that belonged to our brother Elimelech. I thought I should bring the matter to your attention and suggest that you buy it ...
Congregation:

in the presence of these seated here and in the presence of the elders of my people. If you will redeem it, do so. But if you will not, tell me, so I will know. For no one has the right to do it except you, and I am next in line."
Leader:

"I will redeem it," he said. Then Boaz said, "On the day you buy the land from Naomi and from Ruth the Moabitess, you acquire the dead man's widow, in order to maintain the name of the dead with his property."
Congregation:
At this, the kinsman-redeemer said, "Then I cannot redeem it because I might endanger my own estate. You redeem it yourself. I cannot do it."
Leader:
Then Boaz announced to the elders and all the people, "Today you are witnesses that I have bought from Naomi all the property of Elimelech, Kilion and Mahlon.
Congregation:

I have also acquired Ruth the Moabitess, Mahlon's widow, as my wife, in order to maintain the name of the dead with his property, so that his name will not disappear from among his family or from the town records. Today you are witnesses!"
Leader:

Then the elders and all those at the gate said, "We are witnesses. May the Lord make the woman who is coming into your home like Rachel and Leah, who together built up the house of Israel. So Boaz took Ruth and she became his wife. Then he went to her, and the Lord enabled her to conceive, and she gave birth to a son.
Congregation:

Thank You

You May be Seated.

group.title: Message: "Good Things Happen to Good People!"
